categories.summary:
# Discord Chat Analysis for 💻│developers Channel

## 1. Summary:
The discussion primarily focused on naming conventions in the codebase and UI improvements. Ashxn raised concerns about confusing naming in the system, particularly with ServerLoader.js and ClientLoader.js, suggesting they should be renamed to NodeLoader.js and BrowserLoader.js respectively to better reflect their functions. The chat also covered recent UI updates that added model, image, and button functionality, which was well-received. Roustan provided specific feedback about image placement against walls and suggested adding a spatial toggle for video loading based on avatar proximity. There was brief discussion about audio reactivity features, with mentions of using "curve" functionality for implementation. The hyperfy.how website was reported as being down.

## 2. FAQ:
Q: Why is the node client using a system labeled "server" and why does the client folder use nodejs APIs? (asked by Ashxn) A: Unanswered
Q: What happened to hyperfy.how? (asked by Ricky) A: Unanswered
Q: Is anyone doing audio reactivity? (asked by Shiffty) A: Partial answers from ~/^b0gie-(.*)$/ mentioning hyperspeaker and curve access

## 3. Help Interactions:
Helper: 𝕽𝖔𝖚𝖘𝖙𝖆𝖓 | Helpee: Ashxn | Context: Feedback on UI update with model, image, etc. buttons | Resolution: Suggested improvements including audio support, animation toggle, and fixing image placement against walls
Helper: ~/^b0gie-(.*)$/ | Helpee: Shiffty | Context: Question about audio reactivity implementation | Resolution: Mentioned hyperspeaker may have clues and suggested using "curve" functionality

## 4. Action Items:
Type: Technical | Description: Rename ServerLoader.js to NodeLoader.js and ClientLoader.js to BrowserLoader.js for clarity | Mentioned By: Ashxn
Type: Technical | Description: Implement audio functionality for UI | Mentioned By: 𝕽𝖔𝖚𝖘𝖙𝖆𝖓
Type: Technical | Description: Add animation toggle for models | Mentioned By: 𝕽𝖔𝖚𝖘𝖙𝖆𝖓
Type: Technical | Description: Fix image placement against walls (automatically place slightly in front) | Mentioned By: 𝕽𝖔𝖚𝖘𝖙𝖆𝖓
Type: Feature | Description: Add spatial toggle for video app so video only loads when avatar is nearby | Mentioned By: 𝕽𝖔𝖚𝖘𝖙𝖆𝖓
Type: Technical | Description: Implement proper audio reactivity analysis | Mentioned By: Shiffty

# Analysis of Discord Chat in "⚡│general" Channel

## 1. Summary
This chat segment contains minimal technical discussion. The conversation primarily consists of greetings ("gm"), sharing of personal achievements (receiving a customized avatar), and brief comments. One user mentioned that the Hyperfy documentation site (hyperfy.how) appears to be down. There was also a suggestion about creating a Hyperfy case for Solana Seeker phones, indicating potential product development interest. A user inquired about staking availability, but this question remained unanswered. Overall, this chat segment lacks substantive technical discussions, problem-solving, or implementation details.

## 2. FAQ
Q: Is there staking available (asked by alex7) A: Unanswered

## 3. Help Interactions
None present in this chat segment.

## 4. Action Items
Technical: Fix the hyperfy.how website which appears to be down | Mentioned By: dean.land
Feature: Create a Hyperfy case for Solana Seeker phones | Mentioned By: Akuma
